title: Requirements Document - Wedding Checklist
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. Please add functionality to export the checklist to Excel and Import checklist to Excel (provide a template with the columns). This functionality is available for both the checklist template and the individual checklists.

comments.comment: Please add functionality to export the checklist to Excel and Import checklist to Excel (provide a template with the columns). This functionality is available for both the checklist template and the individual checklists.
